TITLE: SUITES ARITHMETIQUES - L essentiel en une image

GLOBAL LAYOUT:
- Landscape format, clean educational infographic for French high school (1ere)
- White background with soft blue and orange accent colors
- Divided into 4 main zones arranged in a 2x2 grid plus a central formula banner
- Clear visual hierarchy: central formula most prominent

CENTRAL BANNER (horizontal strip in middle):
- Background: gradient from light blue to light orange
- Large prominent text in center: the formula u_n = u_0 + n x r
- This formula should be the LARGEST text element, clearly readable
- Subtitle below formula: Forme explicite - calcul direct du terme n

TOP LEFT ZONE - DEFINITION:
- Title in blue: DEFINITION
- Content: Une suite arithmetique est une suite ou chaque terme se calcule en AJOUTANT toujours le meme nombre r au precedent
- Visual: horizontal arrow chain showing u_0 then arrow labeled +r then u_1 then arrow labeled +r then u_2 then dots
- Small boxed formula: u_{n+1} = u_n + r labeled Recurrence
- Note: r est appele la RAISON de la suite

TOP RIGHT ZONE - REPRESENTATION GRAPHIQUE:
- Title in blue: GRAPHIQUE
- Visual: coordinate axes with n horizontal axis and u_n vertical axis
- 5-6 red dots ALIGNED on a straight diagonal line going upward
- Blue straight line passing through all points
- Annotation with arrow pointing to the dots: Les points sont ALIGNES sur une droite
- Small note: Equation de la droite y = rx + u_0

BOTTOM LEFT ZONE - VARIATIONS:
- Title in blue: SENS DE VARIATION
- Three small sub-boxes side by side:
- Sub-box 1 (green border): r > 0 with small upward arrow icon, text Suite CROISSANTE
- Sub-box 2 (red border): r < 0 with small downward arrow icon, text Suite DECROISSANTE
- Sub-box 3 (gray border): r = 0 with horizontal line icon, text Suite CONSTANTE
- Simple mini-graphs for each case showing the trend

BOTTOM RIGHT ZONE - APPLICATIONS:
- Title in blue: APPLICATIONS
- Three bullet points with small icons:
- Piggy bank icon: Epargne avec versements reguliers
- Speedometer icon: Distance parcourue a vitesse constante
- People icon: Population avec apport constant
- Note at bottom: Modelise la CROISSANCE LINEAIRE

MASCOT (bottom right corner, small):
- Cute manga chibi style character
- Scandinavian young man named Sven with blonde hair, light blue eyes
- Wearing teal sweater with spiral pattern
- Making peace sign with calm serene smile
- Small speech bubble: Ajouter c est arithmetique
- Should be discrete, not too large

STYLE DETAILS:
- Clean sans-serif font throughout
- Blue for titles and main accents
- Orange for highlights and key formulas
- Red dots for graph points
- Rounded corners on all boxes
- Subtle shadows for depth
- Professional educational look suitable for classroom display
